mean_cn: n. 代神发布神谕的人，神使，圣贤
mean_en: a person (such as a priestess) through whom a god was believed to speak
word_etyma: or嘴 + acle东西 → 神说出的东西 → oracle 神谕
short_phrase: The oracle tells us the future.
sentence: The ancients went to the Oracle to tell them what the future would bring.
sentence_trans: 古人向神使询问他们的未来。
